import React, {useContext} from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown, OverlayTrigger } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faGem, faCrown } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import styles from './Nav.module.css' import {AuthUserCtx} from '../../context/' export const MainNav = () => { const {authUser} = useContext(AuthUserCtx) return (
King of Diamonds
Game Leaderboard Dark Light
{/* Menu Update profile Log out }>
{authUser.username}
*/} {authUser.username}
) }
